rooms.description: A welcoming space with natural stone finishes and bohemian decor, aligning east-west entrance as per Vastu principles.
Spacious living area featuring eclectic design elements, large windows oriented towards the north to invite positive energy.
Open dining space integrated with living room, designed for social gatherings with natural light from south-facing windows.
Modern kitchen with functional layout, featuring a bohemian backsplash and ventilation aligned with Vastu by being located in the southeast corner.
Luxurious bedroom incorporating Bohemian decor, ample storage space, and east-facing windows for auspicious morning light as per Vastu guidelines.
Cozy guest room with bohemian charm, designed to promote comfort and relaxation. Windows oriented towards the west.
A dedicated library space for reading and research, featuring adjustable lighting and a quiet corner that respects the east-west alignment for positive energy flow.
Dedicated workspace with ergonomic design elements. Windows positioned in accordance to Vastu principles to enhance productivity by capturing morning light.

openings.description: Large windows to ensure ample natural light in the living and dining areas.
Intricate bohemian door designs that allow free flow of energy as per Vastu principles.
